item.title: [delta] torva platelegs ints
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

i have the models for torva but i cant figure out how to add the platelegs i can do the top and helm but im not sure on the legs cus all the other ints for platelegs are diff and weird cus they are all on one line instead of if(i == 18354) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 43072; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 4550; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 925; class8.anInt174 = 14148; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1330; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 310; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 1800; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14147;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14146;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = 14146;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 14147;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Torva platebody";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "Provides excellent protection".getBytes();//examin info }

like this (feel free to use this im not over protective about my stuff i realy couldn’t care less if you use this)
all i need is some platelegs ints that are set out like the one above for class8.

thanks
if anybody wants the torva models zipped or unzipped i have them if u wanna use

EDIT: if anybody wants a tut on how to add torva to a client then ill be happy to do it when i get platelegs ints

Read full topic
